com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1.model

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.model.GenericModel
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1.model.Word
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WordData

    public class Word
extends GenericModel
    Represents the Word in the context of a custom model's for SpeechToText.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  Word.Sort
      The Enum Sort to specify how words are to be sorted when listed.

      The Enum Type to specify the type of words to be listed.
